name: Ovivore
description:
~~The Game~~

In Ovivore you play as a Oviraptor, and egg stealing dinosaur, attempting to survive whilst not starving to death. Make your way through different levels with different dinosaur parents trying to stop you from stealing their progeny. 

~~Early Access~~

This game is currently in a pre-alpha state. There are many features that are planned but un-implemented as well as features that are bare bones in the game and still need to be fleshed out. Please take that into consideration when playing the game. 

~~Progress~~
  • Playable Levels: 6/??
  • Upgrade System: 75%
  • Controller Support: 50%
  • More Game Modes: 0%
  • Localization:
    • Spanish: 10%
    • Portuguese: 10%
    • German: 10%
    • French: 10%
    • Italian: 10%
~~After Playing~~

After you've had a chance to play Ovivore if you could fill out this short questionnaire to help with improving the game it would be appreciated: https://forms.gle/QqvSxhZQBnmK3im68
